title: Senior Software Engineer - Backend
description: We are seeking a Senior Software Engineer to join our backend team. You will work with Python, Django, and PostgreSQL to build scalable APIs. Requirements: 5+ years of backend development experience, strong understanding of RESTful APIs, experience with microservices architecture. Tech stack: Python, Django, PostgreSQL, Docker, Kubernetes, AWS. Remote-first company with a distributed team across the US.
test_case_notes: Remote job with clear tech stack alignment (Python, Django). Should pass filters and score well on match analysis. Tests remote location filtering.
